data.name: Particula
data.detailed_description:
Destroy negativity, clear your mind! Particula brings you a new perspective in gaming, helping you to concentrate and relax. A three players co-op tower defense experience with a relaxing soundtrack, smooth visuals and gameplay.

  • 3 players co-op tower defense, play it with your friends;

  • Random enemies, waves and bosses;

  • Smooth soundtrack and sound effects.

data.short_description: Destroy negativity, clear your mind! Particula brings you a new perspective in gaming, helping you to concentrate and relax. A three players co-op tower defense experience with a relaxing soundtrack, smooth visuals and gameplay.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 or compatible
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 240 (or better)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 or compatible (Also compatible with 10.15 Catalina)
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 1024 MB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
